description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Ray Anthony, New York, N.Y., ca. Aug. 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 008 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress).
